Body: Possible Duplicate:  Where can I find stock or custom ROMs for my Android device?  I do really hate the system that Sony Ericsson has placed on the top of Android and I would like to have ICS (but no problem if not possible or recommendable). I have tried googling and looking around for a couple of days to find how and what custom ROM I could install on my telephone, but I have had no luck in this venture.Does anybody here know about a custom ROM I could install on my telephone? Preferably as clean as possible or similar to HTCs system and ICS if possible and usable.
Title: Custom ROM on Sony Ericsson Xperia Pro (MK16i)
